name: 2Face
overview:
2Face enables you to officially challenge anyone to anything.

Keep record of any challenge, big or small, against you and your friends.

Victories are awarded to your profile and stored forever. As you continue your conquest, your achievements increase rank against friends and strangers alike.

Check up on your friends’ challenges and vote on an expected winner. Comment or attend the challenge. Votes, comments, photos, and videos will live as evidence with the challenge’s outcome forever.

Revisit past challenges and rematch with a single tap.

See how you stack up against competitors of the same category within a geolocation.

Share all of it on facebook and twitter.

Coming to the app store.
